metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10156 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was discovered in the way Ansible templating was implemented in versions before 2.6.18, 2.7.12 and 2.8.2, causing the possibility of information disclosure through unexpected variable substitution. By taking advantage of unintended variable substitution the content of any variable may be disclosed.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
